titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide housing benefits for the purchase of residential cooperative apartment units.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Memorial Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/19/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the provision of loans guaranteed by the Department of Veterans Affairs to veterans for the purpose of purchasing residential property in a cooperative housing project if such cooperative is approved by the Secretary of Veterans Affairs.
